ea0669191883c2e278ee41fb87c7bbf8 (20:38): I know, but surely the best way to illustrate a button is for it to be a button.
ea0669191883c2e278ee41fb87c7bbf8 (20:38): It doesn't have to do anything.
343a75ba500c214d5f48c831025938fe (20:39): but there's semantic markup for it, i'm sure ;p
ea0669191883c2e278ee41fb87c7bbf8 (20:40): You could use <code>, I guess.
343a75ba500c214d5f48c831025938fe (20:45): but that's not markup, that's just a style
343a75ba500c214d5f48c831025938fe (20:45): semantic markup is like <code> that eleaf posted
070e8829387ba18e32dfcfd126085796 (20:46): It would be if there was a true <milk> tag.
070e8829387ba18e32dfcfd126085796 (20:47): I think they need to make a milk tag.
070e8829387ba18e32dfcfd126085796 (20:47): and it could be used whenever you are emphasizing lactaid products.
